Fahri Hamzah Segera Deklarasikan Partai Gelora
04 Nov 2019, 05:37 by Dewi Nurita, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Mantan Wakil Ketua DPR RI,Fahri Hamzah akan segera mendeklarasikan Partai Gelombang Karya atau Gelora. Fahri juga telah meluncurkan logo Partai Gelora di media sosial. "Kita main pelan aja. InsyaAllah nanti tanggal 10 kami undang," kata Fahri Hamzah melalui pesan singkat kepada Tempo, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Fahri mengatakan, struktur partai juga sudah terbentuk sampai ke daerah. Setelah pensiun dari DPR RI pada akhir September 2019, Fahri Hamzah bersama konco-nya di PKS dulu, Anis Matta, fokus dalam pembentukan Partai Gelora.
Banyak yang mengira bahwa partai ini merupakan transformasi dari organisasi kemasyarakatan Gerakan Arah Baru Indonesia atau Ormas Garbi yang juga didirikan Fahri dan Anis Matta pada 2017. Nyatanya, Garbi akan tetap berdiri sebagai ormas, sementara Partai Gelora dibentuk.
Fahri mengatakan rencana pembentukan Partai Gelora ini adalah aspirasi teman-temannya di Garbi juga. Mereka berpikir, setelah membuat ormas, apa salahnya juga mendirikan partai politik. "Lalu, muncullah ide-ide (membentuk Partai Gelora) ini. Mudah-mudahan, Oktober akan kami konkretkan di lapangan," ujar Fahri saat ditemui di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan pada Selasa, 10 September 2019.
Nama Partai Gelora atau Gelombang Rakyat ini, ujar Fahri Hamzah, terinsipirasi dari keinginan membangunkan kembali apa yang telah lama tertidur, yakni kejayaan bangsa. "Nah, apakah bangsa kita mampu bergelora, untuk membangun kembali apa yang lama tertidur. Dari sana nama itu muncul."

Fahri Hamzah Immediately Declares the Gelora Party
04 Nov 2019, 05:37 by Dewi Nurita, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Former Deputy Speaker of the Indonesian Parliament, Fahri Hamzah will soon declare the Wave Party Work or surge. Fahri has also launched the Gelora Party logo on social media. "We will play slowly. God willing, we will invite the 10th," Fahri Hamzah said via text message to Tempo, Monday, November 4, 2019.
Fahri said, the party structure had also been formed to the regions. After retiring from the Indonesian Parliament at the end of September 2019, Fahri Hamzah and his PKS conco, Anis Matta, focused on forming the Gelora Party.
Many thought that this party was a transformation from the social organization of the New Indonesian Movement Movement or the Garbi Mass Organization which was also founded by Fahri and Anis Matta in 2017. In fact, Garbi would continue to stand as a mass organization, while the Gelora Party was formed.
Fahri said the plan to form the Gelora Party was the aspiration of his friends in Garbi too. They think, after creating a mass organization, what's wrong with also establishing a political party. "Then came the ideas (forming the Gelora Party). Hopefully, in October we will be concrete in the field," Fahri said when met at the Parliament Complex, Senayan on Tuesday, September 10, 2019.
The name of the Gelora Party or the People's Waves, said Fahri Hamzah, was inspired by the desire to reawaken what had been long asleep, namely the glory of the nation. "Now, is our nation capable of surging, to rebuild what was long asleep. From there the name emerged."
